scripts.setup: git clone https://github.com/quilljs/quill.git && cd quill && npm install
scripts.build: cd quill/packages/quill && npm install --no-fund --no-audit && (grep -q "skipLibCheck" tsconfig.json || sed -i 's/"strictNullChecks": true,/"strictNullChecks": true, "skipLibCheck": true,/g' tsconfig.json) && BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=1 npm run build -- --format=umd --modules=formula,syntax && cp -r dist/dist/* /yii/web/quill/1.3.7/
scripts.build-and-minify: npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run minify && npm run minify-delta && npm run build-highlight && npm run build-init
scripts.build-all: npm install && npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run build-and-minify
scripts.watch: npm run build-init && chokidar 'src/js/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-init'
